content: your little buddy will be the talk of the dog park in this classic knit coat created in our durable red heart super saver you ll build your skills in knit purl fair isle increases and decreases techniques we ve styled it using timeless shades but with all the color choices available from super saver you can make a coat to suit the style of any furry fashion maven the pattern is offered in sizes to fit dogs both big and small sizes to fit chest measurement s 10 25 5 cm m 16 40 5 cm l 19 48 cm xl 24 61 cm finished chest s 12½ 32 cm m 18 45 5 cm l 21 53 5 cm xl 26 66 cm yarns for model red heart super saver claret 0378 - 1 ball 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m aran fleck 4313 - 1 ball 5 oz/141 g 260 yds/238 m materials size u s 8 5 mm knitting needles size u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needle 36 91 5 cm long set of 4 size u s 7 4 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles
